title: Promise 每隔 1s 输出 1、2、3
body_html:
const arr = [1, 2, 3]
arr.reduce((prev, cur) => {
  return prev.then(() => {
    return new Promise(resolve => {
      setTimeout(() => {
        resolve(console.log(cur))
      }, 1000)
    })
  })
}, Promise.resolve())
